channel.title: word-embedding on SBMARUF
channel.description: Recent content in word-embedding on SBMARUF

item.title: LNMAP: Departures from Isomorphic Assumption in Bilingual Lexicon Induction Through Non-Linear Mapping in Latent Space
item.description: We propose a novel semi-supervised method to learn cross-lingual word embeddings for BLI.

item.title: Zero-Resource Cross-Lingual Named Entity Recognition
item.description: We propose a superior model and training method for zero resource transfer of Cross-lingual Named Entity Recognition.
